name: lucky-chant
effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

The user chants an
incantation toward
the sky, preventing
the foe from landing
critical hits.

It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
